CustomField.description: Relative currency in a currency pair. For example if the rate for CAD/USD = .78, this means that 1 Canadian Dollar is exchanged for .78 US Dollars. CAD is the base currency and USD is the relative currency.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Relative currency in a currency pair. For example if the rate for CAD/USD = .78, this means that 1 Canadian Dollar is exchanged for .78 US Dollars. CAD is the base currency and USD is the relative currency.
CustomField.label: To Currency Code (ISO)
